amendment.description: An amendment to reduce the petroleum reserve account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to allocate an additional $2.5 million to assist the Northern Border Regional Commission with economic and community development in the Northeast United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Welch.
